General.Name: Thanapiriya Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thanapiriya Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates wholesale and retail superstores under Thanapiriya brand in Thailand. It owns 37 supermarkets and 1 wholesale center. Thanapiriya Public Company Limited founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Mueang Chiang Rai, Thailand.
